Package com.tecacet.jflat

Interface Summary
ColumnMapping This interface is used to map columns of a flat file to bean properties.
FlatFileReaderCallback<T> Callback applied to each row of a flat file.
LineIterator Provides access to the next line in a FlatFile.
LineMerger Merge a number of String fields in a single line.
LineParser Parses a line in an array of tokens.
ReaderRowMapper<T> Used by a Flat File Reader to map a parsed line into an Object
ValueExtractor<T>  
WriterRowMapper<T> Convert a bean into an array of tokens.
 

Class Summary
BeanReaderRowMapper<T> Basic implementation of ReaderRowMapper that uses a columnMapping to determine properties to map and a BeanManipulator to set/get the bean properties.
BeanWriterRowMapper<T> Basic implementation of WriterRowMapper that uses a columnMapping to determine properties to map and a BeanManipulator to set/get the bean properties.
ColumnPositionMapping Map columns to properties based on the column index
CSVLineMerger Merges tokens into a line using a CSV separator and adding quotes
CSVParser Parses a line into tokens based on a CSV separator.
CSVReader<T> A reader for CSV files
CSVWriter<T> A writer for CSV files
DefaultCSVReader A CSVReader that reads each line as a String array.
DefaultCSVWriter A CSVWriter that writes a list of string arrays
DefaultRowMapper A 'pass-through' role mapper that preserves the array character of a row.
EmptySpaceParser Parses lines where the contents are seperated by anarbitrary number of spaces
FixedWidthLineMerger  
FixedWidthParser Parses a line with fixed width fields
FlatFileReader<T> Reads a flat file into a collection of beans.
FlatFileWriter<T> Writes a collection of beans in flat file format.
HeaderColumnNameMapping A Column Mapping that uses header information to determine the property that a column is mapped to.
MapReaderRowMapper Maps a row to a (property, value) map where the values are stored as Strings
RegexLineParser Uses a Java regular expression to parse lines
 

Exception Summary
FieldTooWideException  
LineMergerException  
TooManyFieldsException
